content: Yet another thoughtful and thought-filled post that I’ve found on Medium. I “knew” much of what you wrote … but “WOW!” …(my emotional response), that was a key-click of brilliance of pairing Hemingway’s alleged 6-word story to MAGA as an illustration of how people will make decisions based on emotion before facts.“I’ll take a news story with extra emotion — hold the facts, please.”
